# Acceptance Criteria

## AC-1 (FR-1): Success Import @feature1

**Требование:** [FR-1](FR.md#fr-1-data-import)

WHEN user uploads a valid CSV file THEN system SHALL parse all rows and save to database

## AC-2 (FR-2): Export PDF @feature2

**Требование:** [FR-2](FR.md#fr-2-data-export)

WHEN user requests PDF export for a report THEN system SHALL generate PDF file with correct formatting
